name: I'M IN A BIT OF A PICKLE
name_original: I'M IN A BIT OF A PICKLE
description:
You are Pickle Lad who has gotten into a bit of a pickle: the kitchen is on fire and there's some rather hostile tomatoes too. Do you have it what it takes to get to the fire exit alive?

The game is an infinite runner-ish arcade game with random levels. Use arrow keys or WASD to control the character.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 37 gamejame 48h solo challenge.
